#summary How CollisionEvents work

== Introduction ==
To receive information about collisions happening in the PhysicsSpace, your class has to implement the CollisionListener interface and the collision(CollisionEvent event) method. A CollisionEvent object contains all information about a collision.

{{{
public class myClass implements CollisionListener {
    public void collision(CollisionEvent event){
        //get collision force
        float force=event.getAppliedImpulse();
    }
}
}}}
